A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: i have the same reaction to this movie as Luke had to Rey handing him his lightsaber. There are so many storylines going on and it's hard to get emotionally invested in any of them. The tension between Rey\, Luke\, and Kylo was great but it seems that for every good moment there are five terrible moments to go along with it. Snoke is a joke. We still don't really know why Rey is so powerful with the force. The Finn and Rose storyline could've been cut completely. I honestly have no desire to see where these characters end up in Episode 9.
